items.name: Chicken Adobo (Lean & Low-Sodium)
items.description: A heart-healthy take on the Filipino classic. Uses lean breast meat to reduce fat and low-sodium soy sauce to manage blood pressure. High in protein and rich in garlic flavor.

items.name: Grilled Bangus Belly with Ensaladang Talong
items.description: Rich in Omega-3 fatty acids for heart health. This grilled milkfish belly is paired with fiber-packed eggplant and tomatoes to support healthy digestion and weight management.

items.name: Beef Tapa (Lean) with Garlic Brown Rice
items.description: A high-protein breakfast or lunch option featuring top round lean beef marinated in calamansi and liquid aminos. Served with Garlic Brown Rice for steady energy and dietary fiber.

items.name: Chicken Inasal with Steamed Kangkong
items.description: Skinless chicken breast marinated in lemongrass, ginger, and calamansi, grilled to perfection. Served with steamed kangkong to provide essential vitamins and minerals with zero added fat.

items.name: Red Rice Champorado (Low Sugar)
items.description: A high-fiber twist on a Filipino favorite. Made with antioxidant-rich red rice and pure cacao, sweetened with stevia or honey. Provides sustained energy without the sugar crash.

items.name: Sweet Potato & Chicken Energy Bowl
items.description: Replaces white rice with roasted kamote (sweet potato) for better digestion. Served with grilled chicken strips and fresh greens for a complete, nutrient-dense meal.

items.name: Ginisang Monggo with Malunggay
items.description: Packed with iron-rich Malunggay leaves and plant-based protein, served with a side of red rice for a complete amino acid profile.

items.name: Brown Rice Sinangag & Scrambled Eggs
items.description: A healthier 'Silog' alternative using garlic-tossed brown rice and eggs cooked in minimal olive oil. Provides a heart-healthy start to the day with B-vitamins.

items.name: Pinakbet with Lean Pork
items.description: A northern classic loaded with ampalaya, sitaw, and kalabasa. Lean pork loin is used instead of fatty bagnet to provide high fiber and Vitamin A while keeping calories low.

items.name: Laing with Grilled Fish
items.description: Dried taro leaves simmered in light coconut milk and ginger, topped with flaked grilled white fish for Omega-3 and iron.

items.name: Gising-Gising (Low-Fat Gata)
items.description: Finely chopped winged beans and chili peppers cooked in diluted coconut milk. Spicy kick boosts metabolism, beans provide high fiber.

items.name: Chopsuey with Chicken Breast
items.description: A colorful stir-fry of cauliflower, carrots, and bell peppers with lean chicken breast and a light cornstarch glaze to minimize sodium and oil.

items.name: Grilled Salmon with Adlai Rice
items.description: Premium heart-healthy meal featuring Omega-3 rich Salmon. Served with Adlai, a gluten-free grain with a lower glycemic index than white rice.

items.name: Fish Tinola with Sayote
items.description: A ginger-based soup using fresh white fish fillets, sayote, and malunggay leaves. Hydrating and easy on digestion.

items.name: Chicken Sotanghon (Low-Sodium)
items.description: Bean thread noodles in a savory annatto-colored broth with shredded breast meat and low-sodium seasoning.

items.name: Pinaputok na Tilapia
items.description: Tilapia stuffed with tomatoes, onions, and ginger, grilled or steamed to lock in juices. Served with steamed okra and sitaw for a fiber-rich finish.

items.name: Diabetic-Friendly Subscription
items.description: A comprehensive 4-meal plan featuring low-glycemic ingredients, natural insulin-boosters like ampalaya, and zero refined sugars to maintain stable blood glucose.

items.name: Ketogenic Meal Subscription
items.description: High-fat, ultra-low-carb plan designed for ketosis. Rice is replaced with fiber-rich cauliflower and cabbage to maintain satiety.

items.name: Pescetarian Meal Subscription
items.description: A nutrient-dense plan centered on fresh seafood and plant-based sides. Rich in Omega-3 fatty acids and lean proteins.

items.name: Low-Carb, High-Protein Plan
items.description: An athlete-focused plan designed to maximize protein intake while keeping carbohydrates minimal. Ideal for muscle recovery and metabolic health.

items.name: Balanced Filipino Subscription Plan
items.description: Balanced Filipino dining following the Pinggang Pinoy concept. Features lean proteins, red rice, and fiber-filled local vegetables.
